label: Waterproof Clothing and Accessories
description: Clothing and accessories designed to keep the wearer dry in wet conditions.
intents: Protect clothing and belongings from water damage

subcategories.label: Raincoats and Jackets
subcategories.description: Outerwear designed to keep the wearer dry in wet conditions.

subcategories.label: Umbrellas
subcategories.description: Portable devices designed to provide shelter from rain.

subcategories.label: Waterproof Trousers
subcategories.description: Trousers designed to keep the wearer dry in wet conditions.

subcategories.label: Footwear
subcategories.description: Shoes and boots designed to keep the wearer's feet dry in wet conditions.

subcategories.label: Waterproofing Products
subcategories.description: Products designed to make clothing and accessories waterproof.
